articles.author: By  JERUSALEM POST STAFF
articles.title: 'Trump is greatest friend Israel has ever had,' Netanyahu says in exclusive interview - The Jerusalem Post
articles.description: Israel has no greater friend than America, "especially under President Trump's leadership," he said.
articles.content: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu called US President Donald Trump "the greatest friend that Israel has ever had in the White House," in an exclusive Fox News interview that aired on Saturday night, … [+2428 chars]

articles.title: Trump’s assault on public health and the growing threat of an H5N1 bird flu pandemic - WSWS
articles.description: Over the past week, a series of developments have reaffirmed the imminent danger of an H5N1 “bird flu” pandemic, for which American and world capitalism are wholly unprepared.
articles.content:
Employees clean parts of the cages and take the last chickens to be slaughtered inside a poultry store, Friday, February 7, 2025, in New York. [AP Photo/Andres Kudacki]

articles.title: Evidence That the Right's Assault on Women Is Here | Opinion - Newsweek
articles.description: President Donald Trump neutralized a political landmine during the election by emphatically promising he would not sign a national abortion ban, and it's clear now that's not how he will start stifling policies that benefit American women.
